## Introduction

This page explores the relationship between life expectancy and GDP per capita in the Gapminder dataset over time.

## Load data

```{python}
import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

gap = pd.read_csv("gapminder.csv")
gap.head()

years = sorted(gap["year"].unique())

plt.figure()
for yr in years:
    d = gap[gap["year"] == yr]
    plt.scatter(d["gdp_per_capita"], d["life_expectancy"], label=str(yr), alpha=0.4)

plt.title("Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita (1952â€“2007)")
plt.xlabel("GDP per Capita")
plt.ylabel("Life Expectancy")
plt.xscale("log")
plt.legend(bbox_to_anchor=(1.05, 1), loc="upper left", title="Year")
plt.tight_layout()
plt.show()
